1.text: Now fill in the grid using the above descriptions.Write about yourself in the first column.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Now <break time='200ms'/> fill <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> grid <break time='200ms'/> using <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> above <break time='200ms'/> descriptions.Write <break time='200ms'/> about <break time='200ms'/> yourself <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> first <break time='200ms'/> column. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

2.text: Name ............. Viruli Upendran Manuka Rifka Age School Class Hobby Village/ Town Pet Favourite colour Favourite food Favourite subject Ambition
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Name <break time='200ms'/> ............. <break time='200ms'/> Viruli <break time='200ms'/> Upendran <break time='200ms'/> Manuka <break time='200ms'/> Rifka <break time='200ms'/> Age <break time='200ms'/> School <break time='200ms'/> Class <break time='200ms'/> Hobby <break time='200ms'/> Village/ <break time='200ms'/> Town <break time='200ms'/> Pet <break time='200ms'/> Favourite <break time='200ms'/> colour <break time='200ms'/> Favourite <break time='200ms'/> food <break time='200ms'/> Favourite <break time='200ms'/> subject <break time='200ms'/> Ambition <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.text: ² Give a speech on "Myself" to your classmates and write it in your writing book. You can start like this:
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>² <break time='200ms'/> Give <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> speech <break time='200ms'/> on <break time='200ms'/> "Myself" <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> classmates <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> write <break time='200ms'/> it <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> writing <break time='200ms'/> book. <break time='200ms'/> You <break time='200ms'/> can <break time='200ms'/> start <break time='200ms'/> like <break time='200ms'/> this: <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

4.text: Good morning/afternoon! Dear teacher and friends, I'm here to speak about myself. I'm …….
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Good <break time='200ms'/> morning/afternoon! <break time='200ms'/> Dear <break time='200ms'/> teacher <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> friends, <break time='200ms'/> I'm <break time='200ms'/> here <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> speak <break time='200ms'/> about <break time='200ms'/> myself. <break time='200ms'/> I'm <break time='200ms'/> ……. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
